sentences.en: And now this fateful interview had come to a close.
sentences.cn: 这次命运尤关的会见此时已接近尾声.

sentences.en: But fateful forces beyond the band's control were to conspire against them.
sentences.cn: 然而，乐队无力控制的各种决定性力量将会对他们造成不利的影响。

sentences.en: But the " fateful " garlic proved to be not so psychic after all.
sentences.cn: 然而那 “ 命运 ” 的大蒜头这次竟不灵验.

sentences.en: He gave a detailed account of what happened on the fateful night.
sentences.cn: 他详细描述了那个灾难性夜晚所发生的事。

sentences.en: His heart sank as he listened to the judge uttering the fateful words.
sentences.cn: 他听到法官字字千钧的话,顿时垂头丧气.

sentences.en: I relived that fateful day over and over in my mind.
sentences.cn: 我在思想上不断地重温着那决定不幸命运的日子.

sentences.en: It was a fateful decision, one which was to break the Government.
sentences.cn: 那是一项重大的决定，一个将使政府垮台的决定。

sentences.en: Of course, Clinton's mistakes were fateful and ought not to be repeated.
sentences.cn: 当然, 克林顿的错误是巨大的,是不能再发生的.

sentences.en: Seconds after uttering the fateful words'this is easy ', he crashed.
sentences.cn: 说了 “ 这很容易 ” 这句预言性的话后几秒钟, 他的心脏就停止跳动.

sentences.en: She impressed me as so uncanny and fateful.
sentences.cn: 她给我的印象是那样的神秘怪异,那样的未卜先知.

sentences.en: She looked back now to that fateful day in December.
sentences.cn: 她现在回顾十二月里那决定性的一天。

sentences.en: So began a new and fateful chapter in Greek history.
sentences.cn: 就这样,罗马的历史翻开了具有决定意义的新篇章.

sentences.en: That fateful night I was wildly agitated and perturbed, fordespite the.
sentences.cn: 那个灾难性的夜晚,我非常激动和不安, fordespite的.

sentences.en: Their fateful decision to declare war changed the course of history.
sentences.cn: 他们决定命运的宣战决定改变了历史的过程.

sentences.en: This step involved many fateful consequences.
sentences.cn: 这一步骤带来了许多严重的后果.
无论哪个问题都那么要命!

words.tran_cn: 致命的；重大的；毁灭性的；命中注定的
命中注定的，宿命的；受命运支配的
致命地；命中注定地；不可避免地
死亡；宿命；致命性；不幸；灾祸
重大的；决定性的；宿命的

trans.tran_cn: 重大的，命中注定的，决定性的，预言性的
trans.tran_en: having an important, especially bad, effect on future events
